title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
content: JOIN THE EXCLUSIVE UCL Contest!Predict the score and win 2 mBTC. The rules are as follows-1. Predict the exact score of New Castle vs PSG.2. Predict the minute of the first goal (Will be used for a tie above, write N/A in case of 0-0 prediction)3. Total foul (Will be used for a tie above)4. Share your nitrobetting userid.5. Must submit your entry before the New Castle vs PSG match starts.6. You can't edit your submission.Prize1. Winner will have 2 mBTC directly in their BTC segwit address.2. In case of multiple correct prediction, winners will share the prize.Posting format1. Nitrobetting userid:2. Score:3. Minute of 1st goal:4. Total fouls:5. BTC Segwit address:
